prompt:
You waltz on over to the fourth stall.
You cannot see any items on the table, but a great cloaked figure looms over you. The grey shroud reveals no flesh and as you peer into the hole of the hood, all you see is darkness.

dialogue.prompt:
Two gloves seeming not quite fully attached to their sleeves run over a keyboard, which is hooked up to some sort of text to speech machine.
Strong buzzing can be heard emanating from under the cloak.
